title: PantryFox
passwordHelp:
If you don't have an account, tap the add user icon in the bottom left.
 If you forgot your password, tap "Forgot Password".
Hit the back arrow in the top left to go back and select a different way to authenticate.
createUserHelp:
Email must be a valid address.
Password must be at least 8 characters.
Must contain one lowercase and one uppercase letter.
Must contain a number.
Password is case sensitive.
Password must be entered the same way in both password fields.
sortHelp: Tap the button to sort items by that attribute. Or hit cancel to go back.
noNameHelp: Enter a name and try again.
passwordMismatchHelp: Re-enter password field(s) and try again.
vcrButtonHelp: The arrow buttons are for switching pages. They are first page, previous page, next page, and last page respectively.
mergeAlert: Merge will replace all items on your device.
